Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ardad Lili]{Ardad Lili}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Arshea]{Arshea}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Bastet]{Bastet}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Belial]{Belial}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Bolka]{Bolka}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Calistria]{Calistria}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Cernunnos]{Cernunnos}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Hathor]{Hathor}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Isis]{Isis}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Kofusachi]{Kofusachi}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Likha]{Likha}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Lymnieris]{Lymnieris}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Naderi]{Naderi}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Nalinivati]{Nalinivati}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Shelyn]{Shelyn}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Green Mother]{The Green Mother}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Lantern King]{The Lantern King}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Tlehar]{Tlehar}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Charming Touch]{Charming Touch}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Captivating Adoration]{Captivating Adoration}

You evoke passion, whether as love or lust.
name: Passion Domain
